inn1.comm: starts off with a swinging delivery, late swing, pitches around off, moves away, beats a defensive poke

more swing, gets too straight this time, Tamim doesn't look to hit hard, just presents it the open face, and in typical Nehra fashion he doesn't gets down to field and also takes his left leg out of the way and lets it go for four
back of a length this time, defended back to Nehra, this time he fields
back of a length, into the pads, and gently helped away to square leg for two
this time he makes a one-handed save off his own bowling, don't worry it wasn't powerfully hit
full, swinging delivery, starting outside off, shoulders arms to it
pitches it up, just outside off, the ball moves away with the angle, and is allowed to go through to Dhoni
full delivery again, Kayes is enticed into the drive and is beaten by the angle
and he beats him again, just short of the driving length, but he throws his bat at it again
he has shouldered arms for a single, is looking to drive, then at the last moment tries to pull the bat away and the ball runs off the face of the bat, past the second slip
he gets the outwinger this time, swinging into the left-hand batsman, stifled appeal too, but it's going down the leg side
overpitched, he can drive despite the swing, but straight to mid-on
straight delivery, around the middle stump, defended back to the bowler
lands outside off and he shoulders arms to the keeper
he bangs it in short and he goes for the hook, the ball balloons off his glove and Dhoni tries his best to sprint to his right and catch it
timed well and hit hard on the ground, Raina times his jump well at extra cover and fields it
nearly pops a leading edge back to the bowler, keeps it down
he oversteps, the ball is pushed to mid-on
Free Hit Makes the best use of it! He punishes Nehra for a poor delivery, short and sits up nicely, backs away and clubs it over deep midwicket
just opens the face of the bat and glides it to third man
good defense, just outside the off stump and pushed away
fuller in length and he works it past the gap between mid-on and midwicket, not well timed, Gambhir manages to pull it back
gets forward to a full delivery and taps it to cover
the shorter and quicker one, swishes hard and meets thin air, not far from the edge
good delivery to end the over, just shapes away and beats the left-hander's prod forward
full and wide and spanked away, he bends his knee slightly and unfurls a smart square drive past backward point
take that! Nehra bowls it short this time and Tamim picks the length earlym swivels and pulls over square leg on one leg
fullish outside off and defended to the off side
drifts on the pads and the ball clips his thigh and rolls away
good delivery and well left, gets good carry to the keeper off a good length
Dropped! the bug hasn't escaped them it seems, Kayes goes for a full blooded pull and gets a thick top edge, the ball swirls in the air and Harbhajan fluffs it at midwicket
bowls it full and Tamim gets underneath the bounce and scoops him over mid-on, good elevation
solid defence, back to the bowler
dealing in boundaries here, Sreesanth comes round the wicket but drifts on the pads with the fine leg up, easily worked away  past that fielder
Appeal! The ball bent back in from round the wicket and sliced him in half, the ball appeared to clip something before reaching Dhoni who took it really well one-handed falling to his right
he oversteps, Tamim angles it to square third man
Free Hit Fires in the yorker outside off, Kayes fails to dig it out
tries to work it away to the on side but the ball clips his pads and rolls away
swinging in on the pads and clipped away down to deep square leg
worked away to the on side and leg gully runs across to pick it up
he gives him the charge early as a sign of intent, gets to the pitch of the ball and whacks it over midwicket
gets across his stumps and whips him over square leg, there;s protection there, zaheer glares at Tamim after the two collide,  nothing terribly serious
worked away down to deep square leg
tries to work it away over square leg again but he mistimes it
makes him drive, towards short cover, along the ground
inviting a drive again, pushed down to long-off, gets a single
flighted again, gets a some break away, left alone

smart shot, the ball jumps a bit, but he opens the face late, past point, the timing is superb, the outfield quick, and Jadeja's chase and dive in vain. Wait a minute, he has not signalled a four here... clearly Jadeja was in contact with the rope while pushing the ball back in. Funny thing is, they consulted the third umpire...
this one one four all right, no doubt about that, swept powerfully between fine leg and square leg, superb shot
poor delivery, lovely shot, with a leg gully up, he angles into the hips and is lofted over the fieldsman without fuss
fuller and outside off this time, pushed to cover
back of a length, just outside off, defended back to the bowler
on the pads, flicked away to square leg
length ball on the pads, and smartly and deliberately lofted in front of square to beat Yuvraj at deep square leg
and he works it away to square leg for a 33-ball 50, well played Tamim
short, wide, "cut me," it says, and it is cut away, mercilessly, through the gap
full, on the stumps, swept, but straight towards short fine
goes for the big straight loft, the ball doesn't turn, and tales the inside half of the bat, towards midwicket
on the pads, slight turn, played back to Harbhajan
jumps out of the crease, gets too close to the pitch of the ball, and doesn't get power into the straight shot
flat, fast, full, into the pads, and punched away wide of mid-on, Tamim is making India pay for every small error
driven wide of mid-off, takes a sharp single, and gets Tamim on strike
bouncer, gets a false pull from Tamim, but it's a no-ball
is that harsh? full and wide, yorker, beats him, the ball lands on the white indicator for wides, and is called wide
makes room again, this time makes contact and gets a single to sweeper-cover
drops and runs, soft hands, quick feet
back of a length, onto the pads, and defended to leg
back of a length, outside off, opens the face, gets a single to third man

the short ball works and Gambhir takes a blinder by India's recent standards! Tamim's weight is forward as he pulls and can't keep it down, Gambhir has to go about two feet to his left. It's an easy catch, but going by the way India have been fielding, no catch is easy. But what an innings from Tamim, he has set it up for his side; they need to make sure they don't waste this start
and deliberately played past slip, he is slightly beaten by the sharp turn, but then opens the face, keeps the grip soft, and gets four, all along the ground
full ball, on the pads, played to midwicket
angling into the pads again, and worked away for a single
gets onto the front foot, flicks it back to the bowler
nicely tossed up, draws Ashraful into a drive, against the spin, and he ends up wafting inside the line of the ball
into the pads, bunted towards midwicket
big drive and miss, the ball stays low too, and bounces in front of Dhoni
opens his face, gets a single down to third man
tries the short ball, outside off, played towards point
stays back of a length, Ashraful shoulders arms
fuller ball this time, Ashraful drives, gets a thick outside edge for one
gets another single through third man
teasing him outside off, he resists the big drive and presses forward and defends
flatter, on the pads, works it away for one into the on side
turning into the pads, helped away for one
lures him into the drive this time, not much turn and played along the ground towards cover
this time he gets forward and defends watchfully
superb stop by Kohli at cover-point, the rare bright spot about India's fielding, it was cut fiercely by Kayes and he flung himself at it
poor delivery on the pads, deflected away smartly, and the fine leg is too square
this one angles across him, and is defended towards cover
stops at the batsman who is looking to run it down to third man, gets a thick edge but it flies wide of point
length ball outside off, defended back to the bowler
full, into the pads, gets a single to wide of mid-on
slower ball, down the leg side, misses the line big time, Dhoni does well to collect it on the second bounce
driving length outside off, throws his bat at it, gets the inside half of it and straight into the ground
sloppy cricket al around, pitched outside leg, turning away, and Sehwag is lazy at short fine and gives away the extra run by not bending properly
and a zipper to follow it up, turn and bounce, lots of revs, and beats the defensive poke
flighted again, defended this time
pitched outside leg, turning towards the stumps, worked away for one
tossed up outside off, defended on the front foot
worked away off the pads, Raina fumbles at square leg, but they decide against running on the misfield
shot, not big but smart, sees the flat ball towards his pads, and sweeps and beats short fine and square leg
bowled slowly, really slowly, takes ages to come on, and is defended towards point
Ashraful is inches off getting out unfortunately, Kayes hits back towards the bowler who gets a finger onto the stumps, but Ashraful is safely back
driven down the ground, takes a single
looks to paddle, misses gets a leg-bye
short and wide, misses the cut, and brings the umpire into play
fuller, straighter, played towards midwicket
generously flighted again, makes him wait for the ball, driven back to the bowler
flat straight delivery, defended back to the bowler
defended to cover
lovely shot, one of the best to watch, makes room, goes inside out, perfect length for the shot, gets under it and clears the infield easily
defended to cover again, wants the single, is sent back
flatter and quicker, hurried into the cut shot, is safe
opens the fac e of the bat and gets it through covers for one
worked off the pads for a single
short, across him, and cut away for one
tossed up, defended towards cover
comes on the front foot and defends with an open face
gets too full this time, goes for an easy single down to long-of
angling across him, drops his wrists on it and steals a single to short third man
back of a length, flicked towards midwicket
rushing him with a quicker one, pushed to midwicket
worked away off the pads for one
looks to manufacture a shot and almost pays for it, shapes up for the lap shot, Jadeja fires it in flat, and he then opens his face on it and almost edges it
full and fast, almost a yorker, and very smartly he gets slightly inside the line and opens the bat face, finding the gap between point and short third
flighted around middle, defended back to the bowler
drives down to long-on for an easy single
comes down the track, can't beat cover
looks for the arm ball, Ashraful opens the face and gets a single short third
angling across him, he looks for the cut and is beaten
flighted delivery, driven down the ground
a floater around off, defended to cover
flighted just outside off, defended towards mid-on
worked off the hips for a quick single
on the pads and he helps himself to a single
flat, punched down the ground for one
full and flat, opens the face, plays towards cover and comes through for one
soft hands again, gets a single to short third, the partnership is now worth 50
stays low, from a length, beats the attempt at pushing it down the ground for one
full ball on the pads, gets a single to long-on
fulltoss, makes room to go inside out, Raina makes a diving save at extra cover
arm ball, the bat comes down in time, stifled excitement around
driven with an open face, straight to Raina at extra cover
and Raina saves another one here, it's pushed towards long-off, Raina hares across from extra cover and dives and saves one run
on the pads, but hits straight towards square leg
flat into the pads, misses out on the offering
this time goes back and finds the gap on the on side
cut powerfully, to the left of sweeper-cover, gets two
presses forward and defends
looks to run it down to third man, but it's too close to him
soft hands at work again, gets a single to short third man
pushed down to long-off for one
angled across him, and forced through the covers for one
driven to sweeper-cover for one
beats the open face of the bat, nothing shot really
looks for a sharp single to square leg, but Kohli is alert
turn, and he goes for it, and gets a single to short third man
looks to work it to leg for one, can't beat square leg
short delivery, hit straight to midwicket
short-arm pull, this is not a bad delivery, he just creates the length by rocking back and pulls it convincingly
tossed up slower in the air, defended to cover
full delivery again, and defended with soft hands
flighted just outside off, gets onto the front foot and defends
goes for the inside-out shot again, doesn't connect well, gets just one to long-off
worked away off the pads, can't beat midwicket
another quick single, hit straight to Harbhajan at short third; Kayes at non-striker's end would have been gone but it was a difficult throw to make with the batsman obstructing his view
flat on the stumps, defended back
powerful drive, Raina does back at extra cover
into the pads, played towards square leg
maiden fifty for Kayes, smartly played innings too, the crowd goes wild, works this one away to fine leg
good running, played with soft hands towards sweeper-cover, Kayes always knows he wants two and gets it
defended with an open face
soft dismissal, against the run of play, Ashraful looks to run it down to third man, but the ball is pitched within the stumps and is going on with the arm, bowled him!
looks for the big expansive sweep first ball, and misses, going down
way down the leg side, Kayes gets some bat on the fine sweep
flighted outside off, defended towards point
another straight delivery on the stumps, pushed back to the bowler
cut powerfully, straight to Raina at cover
drives this time, finds the same fielder
strays outside leg, and is swept away
turn and bounce, from a length outside off, beats him
his response is an immaculately placed sweep shot, uppish all right, but right between deep midwicket and deep square leg

run-out! direct hit! that's unfortunate because it's coming from an Indian fielder, and from the deep! But on a serious note, Shakib is too keen too early. Kayes stays back in the crease and pushes down the ground, Shakib wants two to long-on because Zaheer has to run in as it has been hit with soft hands, but Zaheer hits them direct and finds him inches short
flighted outside off, worked away to square leg for one
topspinner, and almost another run-out, Raqib plays with an open face, wants two, and Dhoni gets the throw wide and on a half-volley, would have been a close call had the throw been spot on
turn and bounce again, but too much into the pads and he keeps it down
back of a length, punched back to the bowler
flighted this time, and defended again
arm ball, he plays for the turn, and gets an inside edge for a single
looks for the paddle-sweep/scoop, goes too far across the stumps, and almost loses his leg stump
superb shot, goes inside-out, and the ball goes out of the playing area, lovely extension of the arms and timing
goes across again, Sehwag goes too straight, and bowls wides again
played with an open face towards point
length ball, outside off, played with an open face towards cover
dropped by Dhoni, a tough chance down the leg side, angled into the hips, Kayes gets glove onto it, Dhoni dives, reaches with one hand, gets there but can't hold onto it
length ball, on the off line, played back to the bowler
almost holes out to fine leg, good effort ball, dug in short, he pulls, gets a top edge that falls agonisingly (for India) short of fine leg
tries another short one, but this is way down the leg side
driven on the up, but straight to Raina at extra cover
guided down to third man for a single
back of a length, across him, defended
looks to run it down to third man, can't beat backward point
good hit, he has taken the risk, out of nowhere comes the big hit, sees the mid-on up and gets under a length delivery and goes over the fielder
straightening a touch after the angle, defended back
short and wide down the leg side
good bouncer this time, goes over the middle stump, Raqibul sways out of the line
slower ball on the pads, gets a leg-bye
back of a length, punched to point
another wide, goes for the effort ball, and goes down the leg side
short, stays on the front foot, played towards extra cover, where Raina has been good
tucks him up with a back-of-a-length delivery, on the stumps
impatient Raqib looks, looks to clear mid-on again, this one hurries onto him, escapes one-bounce
good bouncer this time, shoulder high, over middle stump, plays a lame pull shot and is beaten
pitches full, is driven, but not past Raina at extra cover
the bouncer works now, the plan works, short into the ribs, Kayes pulls, gets a top edge, and straight to Kohli at deep square leg - India pulling their way back slowly
looks to run it down to third man, is beaten
sharp bouncer again, just a bit too high, though
goes full this time, big shout for lbw, pitching just outside leg, marginally
bunts it down to mid-off and takes a single
leaves this one alone outside off
oversteps, free hit coming up, back of a length and defended towards cover
goes for the slog over midwicket, doesn't get enough bat into the shot, but it chips over the infield and gives them enough time for a couple
slow, making him wait, just stops at him, and he turns it around the corner for one
arm ball, he plays for the spin, gets the inside half of the bat for a single
flat this time, pushed down the ground for one
nicely tossed up, comes forward and defends
arm ball again, Mushfiq drops and runs, is sent back and just about makes it back
fuller this time, driven down the ground for one
around the off line, fullish, defended to cover
back of a length, walks across the stumps and works it to the on side for one
back of a length, gets big on him, but he manges to keep it down and hits wide enough of third man to come back for two
soft hands at work again, no man inside the circle on the leg side, and he just pushes it and comes back for two
fuller, and defended back to the bowler
short, looks for the cut shot, but is beaten by the low bounce
slow in the air, around off, defended back to the bowler
paddled away from outside off
plays with an open face, doesn't go wide of point
the normal sweep this time, towards square leg
looks to cut, but it is too full to cut
and the pressure from Yuvraj gets him a wicket, this time Mushfiq looks to cut again and the extra bounce turns it into an uppish shot, and Jadeja holds on to a safe catch at cover-point
drives a full ball down the ground
defends a straight and fullish delivery back to the bowler
looks to cut but it's too full, and he almost chops it on
fuller delivery, defended back to the bowler
slows it up this time, gets on the front foot and defends
again looks to cut a delivery that is too full and again nearly chops it on
floater outside off, pushed down the ground for one
arm ball, into the pads, defended towards midwicket
nicely tossed now, driven towards cover
gives it nice flight again, can't get it past midwicket
on target again, ninth dot ball for Mahmudullah, getting edgy
looks to drop and run, but it has hardly gone anywhere, and is sent back. Ten dot balls for Mahmudulla now
short, rocks back, makes room and gets a single to sweeper-cover
moves about in the crease, but Jadeja bowls another straight delivery and he is still looking for his first run
and he gets off the mark in a risky manner, goes a long way across and gets the bat down just in time to paddle it
almost sneaks through with the quick arm ball, 90ks, again he gets the bat just in time
worked away into the gap on the on side, with soft hands, hence comes back for two
into the pads, worked around for corner for one
steps out of the crease and chips him over extra cover
sweeps, sweeps well, the first boundary off Yuvraj, all along the ground and bisecting the gap
reverse-paddle this time, fine of short third man
arm ball, 94ks, pushed down the ground
goes back to tossing it up, and is driven down the ground for one
on the stumps, no room to work it away, played softly on the on side, end of a good spell from Yuvraj
reverse-sweep, nearly lobs it to Nehra at short third, and runs in the line of the throw to complete the single
just outside off, defended to cover
tickled around the corner for one
swept away for one to deep square leg
goes for the big sweep fine, misses, is saved by the turn taking it down the leg side
goes squarer with the sweep this time, gets two to wide of square leg
back of a length, just outside off, hit to cover
full and wide, Raqibul - who has backed away - can't make contact

Harbhajan has messed up another catch, that's an ugly swipe, looking midwicket going long-off, Harbhajan  doesn't judge well and doesn't run in fast enough, moreover he doesn't even field it on the first go
limp pull, but chipped over mid-on
slower ball, fulltoss outside off, hit one bounce to cover
slower legcutter, another swipe, mis-hits again, but this one goes wide enough of long-on
floater outside off, runs it down to third man for a single

full, fast, furious, beats the reverse-sweep, takes the leg stump, both Bhajan and the umpire think it's lbw. Bhaj appeals, Ian Gould upholds it, then realises he is bowled, and starts scratching his hat. Quick thinking, ump
pushes it wide of Harbhajan on the on side and gets off the mark
turning into the pads, worked away to fine leg
slows it down a touch, but drags the length back and is cut away in front of square for a couple
goes for the cut in front of square again, and finds Kohli at extra cover
backs away, Jadeja follows him, it's a fulltoss outside leg, but he gets just a single to short fine
flat outside off, gets a single to short third
flat and full, just a single, almost yorker length
slows it down, but the length is almost yorker again, just a single to short fine
errs slightly in length, it's a low fulltoss, Mahmud gets under it and lofts him over midwicket
smartly played, he is expecting a full and flat delivery, reverses his stance and gets it fine of short third man, the bowler's pace does the rest
low fulltoss, gets a single to mid-off
half-volley on the pads, helped away, but fine leg is back and fairly square - so it's neither one nor four
digs it in short, and the pull shot evades a leaping Yuvraj at square leg, the crowd is having a ball
flicks a length ball to mid-on and comes through for a quick single
fulltoss on the pads, and he has missed out on it, hitting straight to deep midwicket
another fulltoss on the pads, and he beats mid-on and gets two before deep midwicket can come around
full, fast, 106ks, and way down the leg side, the idea was to follow the batsman making room, but he went way down the leg side
another fast delivery, just outside off, and he bunts it down for one
angling into the pads, gets a single to short fine
stays low, but the batsman manages to run it towards point and gets a single
opens the face on a short delivery, but can't beat backward point
full and fast again, on target this time, no room no leverage
full and fast again, played with an open face for single to cover
mis-hit towards midwicket for a single
top shot! crunchily pulled, seemed predictable, he was waiting for the bouncer, went back and across and deposited him to the square-leg boundary
backs way, Nehra follows him, but it's a fulltoss, and is turned away fine of deep fine leg
slightly short of a yorker length, gets a single to deep square leg
full, almost a yorker outside off, Naeem is backing away and can't make contact
bouncer, he has got him in helmet with that one, already on the front foot, he is late into the pull shot and gets one on the side of the head protection
swiped away, and Nehra at midwicket lets it through, diving in slow motion, poor fielding again. Mahmudulla reaches 50, Bangladesh equal their highest total against Test-playing nations
and another four, moves across, rocks back, takes a low fulltoss and goes over Nehra
he is not letting them get back to their seats in the stands, this time he gets on a knee and goes inside-out, over extra cover
makes room, Sreesanth goes short and outside off, and he misses, the crowd goes quiet
yorker becomes low fulltoss, and he mis-hits this attempt over the on side but gets two to wide of long-on
goes for the big shot over leg side, Sreesanth bowls a slower ball but he gets a leg-bye

inn2.comm: length ball outside off to start, defended towards point
strays onto the pads, and nicely helped away past short fine leg
comes back on target, off stump and just outside
back of a length, hint of movement away, stays on back foot and defends
stays back of a length, outside off, can't force it through the off side
the no-ball flu is catching, this time Rasel oversteps, helicopter time for the umpire
another no-ball, he makes room and goes over point, and now Sehwag gets a free hit to get off the mark

slower ball, misdirected down the pads, and he goes over the leg-side field, but because the ball doesn't have pace on it, it doesn't clear the ground. Rubel catches at square leg boundary, but they get two
full, into the pads, gets a single to wide long-on
pitches leg, going down, he pads up to it
quick and full, gets a single to wide of mid-on
down the leg side, way down
too full, and turned away to wide of wide long-on for two
jumps out of the crease and gets it to wide long-on
steps out, pushes it down to long-on for one
easy as they come for Sehwag, short and wide, and he gets under it and goes over point
another four, not learning, giving him width, and this time he goes along the ground
over compensates and bowls a wide down the leg side
short, on the pads, and he has protection on the leg side
back of a length, and flicked away to mid-on
fuller, into the stumps, and pushed down to mid-on
he strays too far down the leg side, is worked wide of deep square leg and gives away two

he's a goner! what difference does fielding make! Sehwag punches a back-of-a-length delivery back to Razzak, runs off the misfield, and Razzak chases like a hare, and throws while off balance and finds Sehwag short. He could have dived in, but that has never been Sehwag's thing
quick delivery, defended to leg
another quick delivery, and defended to off
steps out and works a flighted delivery to long-on
stifled appeal, but always angling down the leg side, not much turn there
flighted delivery, stays on the back foot and plays it to point
angled across Kohli, who shoulders arms
full delivery, worked away to midwicket
back of a length, punched down the ground
stays back of a length, no room, pushed to mid-on
almost another run-out for Razzak, Kohli pushes to mid-off and runs, realises he is a goner too, and dives, and Razzak misses anyway
just outside off, forced away but can't beat cover
square drive, good-looking shot, got the width, got close to the pitch and opened the face while going hard at it
angled into the pads, and worked away to square leg
not a body moves in the covers, poor delivery, short and wide and threaded through left of cover-point
dances down the track and gets a single to wide long-on
another poor delivery, short and wide, and cut away in front of point, and there is a hush in the ground that is audible
and he works the next ball away for an easy single to square leg, smart batting
back of a length, no room, bowled from close to the stumps
on the pads, flicked away for one to deep square leg
back of a length, on the pads, and worked away to deep square leg
wide down the leg side, every now and then he is missing the line
angled across him, and he opens the face towards point
fuller this time, watchfully defended towards mid-off
slower ball, pushed back, Rasel gets a hand to it
fullish, on the stumps, no room, defends it cover
back of a length, good line, no room, Gambhir can only defend it

bowled him, played on! The crowd can be heard in Dhaka! fuller delivery, again not much room, angling slightly outside off, Gambhir - so restrained of late - goes for the big drive, gets an inside edge, and Bangladesh can sense something special here
goes for the effort ball, short, just strays down the leg side
full ball, big grunt, Yuvraj defends, not much footwork
goes for the pull, not that short, plays to wide of mid-on
flicked of the pads, gets a single to get off the mark

then there were three! they are all over Rasel here, ruffling his hair, this is the big one, Yuvraj. Offcutter, comes in from back of a length, and Yuvraj ends up playing inside the line of it, the off stump is disturbed. Mad scenes in the crowd
back of a length, angling across, defended to short cover
hits the same length again, pushed down to mid-off
full ball, driveable, is driven, but can't beat cover
slower ball, bang on target, defended back
quick single, to wide of mid-off, just a push with soft hands so he can make it in
short, Dhoni looks for the big pull, misses, is hit in the thigh pad
oversteps - is he too excited? - was an effort ball, short of a length
attempts a yorker, but it's a fast, calf-high fulltoss, can't get power into it, just a single
this silences the crowd! Strays onto the pads, and nonchalantly flicked away to the square-leg boundary
bowls outside off, Kohli thinks of a cut, and then lets it pass
good-looking drive on the up, but can't beat cover
push-drives this time, but finds cover again
length ball, hit back down the ground, to mid-off
on target again, length is not driveable, there is no room, and it's pushed back to the bowler
looks to cut, doesn't get room, gets the inside half of the bat
slower ball, on target, no room again, presses forward and pushes it to mid-off
and again no room, back of a length, keeper up so Dhoni can't even perform cute walks down the track
this time he gets room and a length to drive, and he gets two to wide of sweeper-cover
length delivery, just outside off, pushed back to the bowler
back of a length, looks to force it through covers but can't beat point
looks for a sharp single to point, but it's gone straight  to the fielder and he is sent back by Dhoni
bouncer, a bit too high, well directed otherwise
misses out on a leg-side offering, but gets two leg-byes
looks to drive straight, bat face turns in his hand, gets a single to wide of mid-on
Tamim dives at third man, but should have prevented this boundary, it goes off a thick outside edge, and Tamim lets it sneak underneath his dive
full delivery, angled across him, pushed down to mid-off
driven powerfully, but straight to mid-off
slower ball on the pads, well played, with soft hands, deliberately so he can take two and they rush through without second thoughts
pushed across him, and he gets a single to sweeper-cover
offcutter, looks to run it down to third man, and is beaten outside off, Rasel's appeal is turned down - there is no contact
seam up now, back of a length, pushed to mid-off
gets a slight bit of room and forces it through covers for one
dabbed away to third man for one
he is given room to free his arms here, and he powerfully cuts it in front of square, and gets two to wide of sweeper-cover, where Mahmudullah makes a diving save
looks for the cut again, doesn't move his feet and the ball stays low too, and he is beaten
slower ball, looks to drive, can't beat cover
another slower ball, driven again, but this time straight towards mid-off
good start, flighted, on target, defended back to the bowler
slightly outside off, dabbed towards short third
fired into the pads, and they steal a quick leg-bye to short fine
draws him forward, Dhoni defends
shorter, into the pads, he goes deep into the crease and works it into the leg side
short again, Kohli goes back and pushes it down to long-on for one
Shakib misfields at cover, it is short and drilled towards him but he doesn't collect it cleanly
steps out, can't work it past Kayes
similar shot but wider, yet Kayes dives and makes sure it is a dot
stays back this time and pushes it down to long-on
into the pads, worked away to square leg for a single
presses forward and defends
pushes a fullish delivery down towards long-on
dances down the track, hits straight, shouts 2 right away, and gets it because long-on is wide
jumps out of the crease again, misses, Kohli wants a leg-bye, Dhoni doesn't, Kohli is sent back and he makes it safely
shorter delivery, pushed down the ground, gets one
gets onto the front foot and drives a full delivery to long-off
jumps out of the crease again, misses again, and there is no leg-bye on offer again
back of a length to start off with and pushed to long-on
no spin, short, widish, and cut away for one
fuller this time, makes a diving save to his right to save a single
slower in the air, no spin yet, pushed down the ground for one
Mahmudullah makes a full-length dive at third man and prevents a boundary. It was a late cut, running past point but Mahmud came from sweeper-cover and made the clean save
easy single to sweeper-cover this time
flat, skids, Kohli pushes it back to the bowler
this time it's wide and gets a single to long-off
forced away off the back foot and gets a single to sweeper-cover
looks to drop to cover and run, but is rightly sent back by Dhoni
good-looking drive, wide of sweeper-cover, which allows him to come back for two
flat delivery, rocks back, forces it down to long-on
worked away off the pads for a single to deep backward square
fuller ball, on the pads, driven down the ground
turning into the pads, helped away for a single to fine leg
overpitched, easy single to long-on
Razzak misfields at the boundary, it was a low fulltoss, dipping, drilled wide of long-on, Razzak runs to his right but can;t prevent four. Wasn't a straightforward save
this time he drives straight towards Razzak and jogs through for a single
arm ball, into the pads, pushed to wide of long-on and they come through for two - good running
throws it up this time, Kohli doesn't get power behind the drive and hits it back to the bowler
flatter this time, he goes deep inside the crease and forces it down to long-on
flighted outside off, Dhoni drives from far from the body, bottom hand comes off but the ball travels along the ground towards long-off
into the pads and worked away to fine leg
jumps out of the track, looks to turn it to leg, can;t beat midwicket
flat, on the pads, played back to the bowler
this time he gets too straight and is worked away
drilled past the bowler, superbly timed too, flighted outside off, right in his zone and the bottom hand drives the drive (pardon the expression), Rubel at long-off dives in vain
full outside off, opens his face, can't beat backward point but gets one
presses forward and flicks it to long-on for one
short, and this time he punches it to the other side of the long-off, long chase for Rubel who does well to save the boundary
fired into the pads, beats his attempt to work it around
another dot, again fired into the pads
three dots in a row, Kohli getting edgy, can't beat midwicket off the back foot
takes himself away from the strike, rocks back and goes wide of midwicket
fulltoss, hit powerfully, but straight towards long-on
driven through to sweeper-cover, gets a single
full delivery, played back to the bowler
gets to his fifty with a well-placed couple, it is on the pads, worked away with soft hands, early call, gets to 51 and acknowledges the reception, not wild, subdued
looks to flick it for one, can't beat beat midwicket
good placement again, wide of long-off, and not too powerful, enough to have him come back for two
half-volley, driven firmly, can't beat extra cover, and he shows his disappointment at not finding the gap
shorter, drives again, and finds extra cover again
flat delivery, plays with an open face, gets one
fired in again, stays back and pushes it down to long-on
drives in front of his body, keeps it along the ground, Shakib sticks his foot out and keeps it to dot
this time he gets close to it and drives it down to long-off
misses out on a leg-side delivery, hitting it straight to short fine
this time waits an extra half-second and works it fine of short fine and gets a couple
arm ball from offie from round the stumps, Dhoni recovers well and gets the bat down in time
short, into the pads, worked away to fine leg for one
flicks from front foot, can't beat midwicket
half-volley outside off, driven down to long-off
flat delivery, Dhoni opens the face at the last moment, Tamim at short third and keeps them down to one
stays at the back foot and pushes it down to long-off for one
leg-side half-volley, gently turned away, wide of deep backward square, and gets two
another leg-side half-volley, this time flicked away more powerfully, but straight to sweeper
superbly placed, good hook shot, takes the bouncer on and bisects deep backward square and deep midwicket - he is a good player of the hook shot
big shout for lbw, but the inside edge makes it a clear not-out
tucks him up with a back-of-a-length delivery, which jags back in too
similar delivery, but this time Dhoni plays with soft hands and comes through for one
looks for his Sachin-like shot in the V behind the wicket, but misses
flighted on the pads, flicked away for one
flat delivery, pushed down to long-on
flighted outside, driven down to long-off, inside out
is hurried into the pull, mis-hits, and it falls short of midwicket diving forward
flat on the pads, easy single
full delivery, mis-times the drive, dot ball to mid-off
strays onto the pads, flicks it to midwicket for one
and this is the third time in four overs that he has driven firmly but straight to extra cover, crucial period in Kohli's innings to see if he gone through this edgy phase
drops a short delivery at his feet and is called through for a single, which is ultimately completed with ease
exquisite drive, on the up, all along the ground, through the extra cover gap
gets to his fifty with a smart little nudge to third man
Raqibul, with his swinning-pool dive, saves two at sweeper-cover, it was hit powerfully and travelling fast
and it's followed up by a misfield by the captain at extra cover, Shakib has been iffy in the field today
this is the more orthodox cut, poor delivery all right, but it needed to be placed left enough of sweeper-cover and he does that by waiting for an extra second
poor delivery way way down the leg side, he got bat on it while trying to sleep but it was too difficult to spot from front on
another wide ball down the leg side, this time surely a wide
stays low a touch, and gets the bottom half of the bat
and again it stays low, he almost chops it on
driven down the ground, easy single
gets onto front foot, and drives down to long-off
plays in front of his body, a sort of leading edge, but it bounces before Mahmud
again a drive down to long-off
and another walk to long-off
steps out, hits forcefully, straight to long-off
misses out on a fulltoss, driven hard but back to the bowler, gets a single off the fumble
another extra-cover drive goes to hand, Shakid does well by diving and saving three
short, rocks back, and cuts it away for one
one loose ball too many, too short and pulled wide of long-on, that will settle down any edginess Kohli has
works this one away gently for a single
comes onto the front foot, can't flick it past midwicket
Shakib fires down the leg side, and is swept down for one
looking for the turn, doesn't get any, gets an inside edge towards fine leg, and they steal two
has Shakib dropped the match? hit back to him low, and it slips out of his hands
jumps out of the crease, and flicks it to midwicket for one
tossed up from round the wicket on middle, driven down towards long-on for a single
short of a good length on leg stump, turned away gently in the direction of deep square leg and they have just about enough time to scamper back for the second
flighted and misdirected, down the leg side, goes for the sweep, misses, given a wide
rocks on the back foot and slaps it hard in front of point, good save in the deep as deep cover runs to his left, dives and keeps them down to just two
tickled into the leg side for a single
slightly short on middle, punched down towards long-on for a single
beautifully done, tossed up, lands on leg stump, gets down, bends low and paddles it down to the fine-leg boundary, easy runs these
ooh, gave it some air and bowled it full on middle, tries to crash it through the off side, gets a thick inside edge towards square leg, a single taken
floated around the off line, defended off the front foot
Dhoni is running like a train, pushed down the ground, just to the left of long-on, and he comes back for two
looks to turn it to leg, misses but the ball is always going down the leg side
pushed down to long-on again, gets only one this time
rocks back, gets a flat delivery and takes a single to long-on

Shakib holds on to one this time, this one is flighted generously, Kohli - cramping - has to reach out for the drive, is not to the pitch of the ball, and ends up hitting it low and back to Shakib. Well played Kohli, Bangladesh have look-in again, just when it started to look like a cruise
that's a poor delivery from Razzak, the pressure is off again, short and wide, and Dhoni slaps it in front of square, sweeper-cover has no chance
fuller, driven to sweeper-cover for one
Raina off the mark with a single pushed down to long-on
another misdirected delivery, down the leg side, Dhoni gets some pad on the way
pushes right forward, and defends back to the bowler
flat, goes back, forces it through covers for one
full and straight, defended back to the bowler, but it bounces over his head
back of a length, angling away, Raina punches it nicely to sweeper-cover
slower ball, punched back towards the bowler, who dives but can't stop it completely
goes for the short one, but bowls it wide down the leg side, not called, though
another short ball, lets out a big grunt, Raina gets tall, rides the bounce, drops it to leg and takes a single
slower ball, Dhoni looks to cut, and is early into the shot and get the inside half of the bat towards mid-on
and starts off with a poor poor loosener, half-tracker, on the pads, Dhoni accepts it with gratitude
and stays down the leg side, and pays through extras
missed out, it was short and wide, and he ended up playing with a vertical bat, and straight towards extra cover
misfielded by the bowler, gives away a single where there is none
flighted outside off, Dhoni goes back and pushes it down to front foot
tossed up around middle line, defended back to the bowler
another flighted delivery just outside off, defended back to him again
fulltoss, low, and is hit down the ground for a single
drops towards point and runs, it's a tight single, he just about makes it at the non-striker's end, the throw misses anyway
short, pushed to mid-off and runs, and Dhoni has made it despite the direct hit
short, and way down the leg side
misses out on a leg-side gift here, turns the bat face too early
full delivery outside off, driven to wide of sweeper-cover
wide, not short enough but Raina moves across and clears point, and gets four important runs
gets right onto the front foot, pushes it into covers, gets one
flat delivery, hit straight towards midwicket
uppishly played, beaten in the flight as he steps out, but even if he is playing away from the body, he goes ahead with the shot and gets it wide of extra cover
fired in, hit back to the bowler
full and wide down the leg side, fired in again - did it slip out because of dew?
half-tracker, Raina shapes up for the pull, but this stays low, yet gets enough bat to get a single
defends in front of his body
short, skids on, gets a single to long-off
full ball, driven down the ground, gets one
tossed up generously, defended with soft hands
full, into the pads, helped away for a single to short fine
short, looks to pull, it skids again, and there is a dot ball
halftracker, asking to be deposited into the stands, Dhoni shapes to oblige, it stays low, Dhoni's bat comes down in time to keep his stumps safe
back of a length, on the stumps, defended watchfully
another ball on target, Raina not taking chances
this time he opens the face, and gets a single to sweeper-cover
and he has driven it immaculately again, and the asking rate goes below six again, full delivery, dismissed between mid-off and extra cover
slower delivery on the pads, and worked away for a single
full delivery on the pads, helped away for one to fine leg
angling into the pads, flicked straight to midwicket
another flighted delivery, around off, hit straight towards extra cover
there comes the poor delivery, short, into the pads, but gets just a single this time
short and wide, cut away to sweeper-cover for a single
smart shot, fantastic running, uses the bowler's pace, makes room and helps it past point, and Dhoni has absolutely motored along for three
what Raina does Dhoni does better, the right-hand image of the previous shot, opens the face and helps it past backward point, and this one travels for four
drives on the up, gets a thick outside edge, towards point
fuller ball, driven down the ground, but a little too powerfully to mid-on
slower ball, 99ks, short, and he pushes it for one to sweeper-cover
length ball on the pads, helped away for a single
fulltoss, and Raina obliges, straight hit, bisecting mid-on and mid-off
Raina is hurrying up now, gets under a length ball, clears mid-on, and this is most likely a cruise from here on
angled down the leg side, but can't get bat to it
full delivery, hit to leg, can't beat midwicket
dances down the track, drives down the ground, is now within a hit of a century
flat, around off, defended to cover
this time flighted nicely, Raina opens the face, but it's gone straight to short third
on the pads, Dhoni misses out, Raina wants a single but it's gone straight to square leg
full outside off, drilled down to long-off
looks to sweep, misses, won't even get a leg-bye
low fulltoss, played between long-on and midwicket, gets two
overpitched on the pads, worked away for a single
on the pads, and he finds short fine leg this time, only four off, can Bangladesh make something happen from here?
yorker to start off with, dug out to midwicket
low fulltoss, mis-hit, but he gets a single to wide of mid-off
low fulltoss again, hit powerfully back, Rubel gets a hand, but can't stop one
Raina top-edges a bouncer, always climbing into him, a good bouncer, clears short fine log, though
length ball, looks to slog, doesn't connect well, but gets two to wide of deep midwicket
one short ball too many, and this is a softy too, chest high, not much pace, Raina gets under it and pulls it over square-leg boundary

Century for Dhoni, fulltoss, flicked away fine of short fine leg, efficient century, brings up efficient century, the team stands up for effort, it's knocks like this that get him the respect of the team
helped away to square leg for one
it's all over in Mirpur, Raina makes room and goes over point, making it look easy
